app_usage.title: What will you use this app for?

aboutApp.title: About
aboutApp.content:
This app is a personal journal where you can pour out what you feel throughout the day. Based on your words, summaries and visualizations are generated to help you better understand how your week or month has been.

Each night, your journal entries are analyzed and structured to provide context and create a better profile for you. Also, the previous dayâ€™s entry is closed, and you will be able to see the dayâ€™s rating, the haiku, and the weekly summary will be updated.

This is not a psychologist or a source of therapeutic advice. It does not replace professional help.

Your information is private and only you can decide what to do with it.
